boat.name: Lila of Cowes
boat.full_description: She is currently lying in Santa Cruz de Teneriffe having been sailed from Cowes to Lanzarotte in 2017 by her current owner. She has many unique modern touches to add to her classic hull and rig. In particular her hybrid diesel engine /generator/electric propulsion system which makes her extremely convenient as a live- aboard. She is fitted out for blue water cruising and is an excellent passage maker.
boat.short_description: Lila of Cowes is one of two Wylo 35.5 steel gaff rigged cutters professionally built by Voyaging Yachts in East Cowes.

for_sales.sales_text: She is currently lying in Santa Cruz de Teneriffe having been sailed from Cowes to Lanzarotte in 2017 by her current owner, who also owns Voyaging Yachts. She is fitted out for blue water cruising and is an excellent passage maker. She has many unique modern touches to add to her classic hull and rig. In particular her hybrid diesel engine/generator and electric propulsion system makes her extremely convenient as a live-aboard and a satellite phone makes for convenient data download worldwide. She is under-utilised and available for sale outright. However the owner is also interested in retaining a 16/64ths share and finding three other like minded joint owners.A detailed user manual with many photographs is available.
for_sales.summary: For sale out-right or by share
